alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 5:49AM EDT until June 22 at 6:15AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM EDT FOR CENTRAL FRANKLIN COUNTY... At 549 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Carrabelle, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, St George Island, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Franklin, Carrabelle Beach, Alligator Point, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Royal Bluff, High Bluff, Yent Place, St George Island St Pk, Green Point, Lanark Village and Creels. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
